original_query: SELECT MIN(v.Id) FROM votes as v, posts as p, users as u WHERE v.UserId = p.OwnerUserId AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=12 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-22 04:38:06' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-08 15:55:02' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-22 04:38:06' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-08 15:55:02'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 12
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
